projects.name: Dailo
projects.description: Dailo transforms educational content into interactive podcast-style conversations using AI. Learn hands-free while commuting or exercising, with the ability to ask questions anytime. Perfect for busy professionals who want to make the most of their time.

details.abstract: Dailo transforms educational content into interactive podcast-style conversations using AI. Learn hands-free while commuting or exercising, with the ability to ask questions anytime. Perfect for busy professionals who want to make the most of their time.

problemSolution.problem: Traditional online learning requires screen time and active engagement, making it difficult for busy professionals to fit education into their daily routines. Existing audio content like podcasts lacks structure and interactivity, limiting effective learning.
problemSolution.solution: Our platform transforms learning into an interactive audio experience that combines the casual engagement of podcasts with the structure of formal courses. Users can learn hands-free while commuting or exercising, pause to ask questions, and maintain steady progress through structured contentâ€”all through AI-generated conversations that adapt to their learning style and pace.

targetAudience: Busy professionals seeking efficient learning during daily activities
Students who prefer audio learning over traditional reading
Lifelong learners who enjoy podcast-style content

keyFeatures.title: Podcast-courses
keyFeatures.description: Educational content delivered in an engaging podcast format

keyFeatures.title: Real-time interaction
keyFeatures.description: Users can pause and ask questions at any point

keyFeatures.title: Knowledge test
keyFeatures.description: Interactive knowledge assessment with course with badges and course completion

keyFeatures.title: Episode generation
keyFeatures.description: Additional individual episodes can be generated by the user

keyFeatures.title: Host and difficulty selection
keyFeatures.description: Customizable learning experience with choice of AI host personalities and content complexity levels

steps: Select a course and customize learning preferences (host personality and difficulty level)
Listen to AI-generated podcast-style episodes with natural conversations between host and guest
Interact freely by pausing to ask questions or take knowledge checks
Generate additional episodes on specific topics you want to explore further
Track progress and earn completion badges as you advance through the course

members.name: Miguel la Corte
members.bio: Miguel is a skilled developer with a special blend of expertise in audio, web and blockchain technologies. His work has been presented within CTM Festival 2023 in Berlin, Goethe Institute Venezuela and within HKW Berlin, Centre Pompidou in Paris and CCCB in Barcelona through the Cultures d'avenir program

members.name: Moritz Stellmacher
members.bio: Moritz Stellmacher is a tech entrepreneur with expertise in marketing and blockchain. After scaling a marketing agency and serving as CEO of Abend, he co-founded the leading blockchain education platform Dacade. Currently a partner at Ape Unit, focusing on blockchain development.
